values: Just needed to write a quick thinking of you message for my grandad, who died exactly one year ago. I really miss him, so i went round my nans to see if she was ok and we sat looking at pictures of us when we were younger, it was pretty cool actually..hmm oh well, this was only meant to be a short short entry so i'll leave everyone be..night night.
http://carisofthecaris.livejournal.com/4265.html

I laughed my ass off today when Charlotte made a clever pun about how my ex's sideburns related peas as they are just too damn small. Apart from that and randomly saying hi dorkishly to people i did hardly anything...Oh i just remembered how cool my art teacher is, we started off by talking about how to shade in wood and ended up trying to think of every subject with the word wood in it..OMG i can't belive i didnt think of Elijah. how silly. :S
http://carisofthecaris.livejournal.com/3926.html

Today my fellow student Ruth told me about her dream. Here goes ( i apologise for the randomness and before you start asking...Stantion is a small town where Ruth lives):
Ruth, our friend Gemma and I were being held hostage in her bedroom while nazis took over stantion... For some strange reason the window was open so we climbed out and jumped her back wall which leads into a graveyard(it does in reality people!)and Gemma randomly ran away escape the semi mortal doom of the nazis. Ruth and I however were not so lucky after catching sight of us they followed- shot me dead and captured ruth. I was quite annoyed to find that Ruth then prayed for GEMMA and not her long lost dead companion ME. but anyway, that was the higlight of our conversations today. hope you enjoyed!
http://carisofthecaris.livejournal.com/3800.html

OK watched the extras of billy and dom on ttt dvd again and it just cracks me up! I heart billy when he explains that the noseflute is probably a very hard instrument to master. how true. I also learnt a valuable lesson in microphone tape and how NOT to stick it to a hairy chest unless you want it to be ripped off...<s>hehehehhehehehe</s> i mean...ouch

Ohhh had a blast today! One Big sunday provides many opportunities to get hit stamped or puked on. For example, i myself was hit by a floating inflatable chair followed by a carefully aimed loo roll. I couldnt moan for long however, as electric 6 made their appearance and sang the oh so joyful songs, gay bar and high voltage.

MWAHAHAHAH i'm in an extreamly dark evil mood today, making fun of people as i go along you see, for example:

~CARIS~"No," he said hastily. "No more spankings." says:
i dont like THAT kind of music
~CARIS~"No," he said hastily. "No more spankings." says:
only electric 6 but theyre not that great
Michael... Fine... says:
they are kind of funny
~CARIS~"No," he said hastily. "No more spankings." says:
well i thoguht you might've liked them
Michael... Fine... says:
hmmm
Michael... Fine... says:
and what is that crack supposed to mean?  
~CARIS~"No," he said hastily. "No more spankings." says:
figure it out for yourself..tehe
Michael... Fine... says:
... i'm not gay!
~CARIS~"No," he said hastily. "No more spankings." says:
ok michael *pats head* whatever you say
Michael... Fine... says:
no, i'm actually not
Michael... Fine... says:
i mean, i know i looked amazingly camp with the sleeves rolled up an' all
Michael... Fine... says:
but  
~CARIS~ "DYNAMITE, I AM GOING TO BLOW UP THE SCHOOL." says:
heh heh heh.....
Michael... Fine... says:
shut it
Michael... Fine... says:
only joking
~CARIS~ "DYNAMITE, I AM GOING TO BLOW UP THE SCHOOL." says:
what are you joking about.....this whole conversation is one big pointless joke
Michael... Fine... says:
i don't know
Michael... Fine... says:
you didn't think i actually would did you?
~CARIS~ "DYNAMITE, I AM GOING TO BLOW UP THE SCHOOL." says:

~CARIS~ "DYNAMITE, I AM GOING TO BLOW UP THE SCHOOL." says:
wear rolled up sleeves
Michael... Fine... says:
lol
Michael... Fine... says:
no, i meant actually know what i'm joking about
~CARIS~ "DYNAMITE, I AM GOING TO BLOW UP THE SCHOOL." says:
* falls over in confuzzlment*
Michael... Fine... says:
meh
Michael... Fine... says:
let's drop this conversation, it's too heavy
~CARIS~ "DYNAMITE, I AM GOING TO BLOW UP THE SCHOOL." says:
agreed.

I also finished reading that oh so lovely harry potter story that dearest laura guided me to, all i can say is'EVERYTHING means another spanking...'

Yesterday, 9th of May was Jenny's offical last day at our beloved school CTC. so I am writing this in memory of the loveable god of mud jenny short.
Here is a little song with the words slightly adapted for such an ocassion:
Jenny jenny how wonderful you are,
Jenny jenny you shine like your a star,
jenny jenny we wouldnt get very far so why do you have to goooooooooooooo

Now please everyone take a moment to think of our dearest friend...JENNYYYYYYYYYY!!!!

Being bored is one of the worst things you can ever feel. Especially when your in your own house with nothing to do, and nowhere to go.
http://carisofthecaris.livejournal.com/1792.html

I was in a boringish mood, when i wanted to kill everyone on the planet(maybe Lurtz was feeling bored today). And so after a tormenting 3 3/4 hours of tests i trudged back home to find chips, yes chips! Not burnt ones but loveable happy chips which go well with salad cream, and so after eating them i no longer am in a bad mood...
THE END

Good evening ladies and gentlemen. Here's a little number I tossed off recently in the Caribbean. [Sings]

     To the world's biggest prick.

     And you won't come back.

just a little cheer-me-up song to brighten the day!

The Nazgul walk up to Theodred and look around the empty horse parking lot behind him. 

Theodred: Welcome to the R.O.H.A.N dealership! 

Nazgul 17: The what? 

Theodred: You know the R.O.H.A.N. Music! Lights! 

The lights go off (even the sun), a disco ball appears out of nowhere, everyone is suddenly wearing ugly seventies clothes. The Y.M.C.A music starts playing in the background and Theodred starts singing: 

Ride it!
If you don't have the dough
I said ride it
Then you know where to go
There's a place here called R.O.H.A.N
You-can-get-a-horse-now
Just ride to the R.O.H.A.N
Come to the R.O.H.A.N
You can get your own horse
Or maybe a cow
When you first ride
You're sure to go WOW!
Just ride to the R.O.H.A.N
Come to the R.O.H.A.N
Ride a new cow
Or maybe a horse
Any other dealerships
Are so much worse
So come to the R.O.H.A.N
Just go to the R.O.H.A.N


Nazgul 13: Okay, okay, we get the point! 

Disco music stops and lights come back on. 

Theodred: Sorry. 

(song belongs to the author of dude wheres my ring)

Well hello there! Me and Charlotte coming live from the IT suit at school! Not East Carlton Park on the log as we usual present our show live from there. Well once..when we were bored...and had a dictaphone. Charlotte is currently moaning about Heath Ledger and i quote 'owww he has no hair and a beard now! Oha nd first of all hes all peace and then theres just a random image of him!' By now shes getting mad about his new girlfriend...yes NEW! I might have to take cover and look for my beloved Billy n Dom!
Ta-ta for now!

I'm so proud! My first entry! Its like having that book full of firsts, some are nice, and then some are stupid, like, first time you passed wind, or first time you had banged your head against the table corner. 
But anyway, my first entry in live journal (must remember to spell that correctly)if you follow this carefully you will get an exclusive insight to my life, i bet you all would love to see that!...*dust balls fly past scene* or not.
Who cares! Basically i will explain a few things:
-I have two alter egos named Lurtz 2 and girly Frodo (you'll hear more about them later)
-I hate rude people and i heart geeks.
-I have two bestest friends in the whole world 9and around the world too may i add) laura from Belguim and Charlotte from near me.
-I like to say great alot

So there you have it, comment, and read up on 'THE LIFE OF CARIS!'
http://carisofthecaris.livejournal.com/367.html
